page.title: 09JUNIOR SCHOOL, SOUTHWELL (3)
page.content: On open evening's the parents are able to meet their child's teacher and discuss his or her work. The children receive swimming lessons once a week for a term at Southwell {Recreation Centre.}They have music ,pysical education,health education, and religious studies.Clergy from both the Minster and the Methodist Church visit the school periodiclly to conduct the morning service.Sometimes the children receive{homework,}but not very often,and only in small amounts. Various{clubs}take place either in the lunch hour or after school.The clubs include art,badminton,chess, drama,film club,Gymnastics,recorder groups,guitar club.There is also a bookshop and fiction library.The school also makes use of four BBC. { Computers,video and a television.}The P.T.A. helps to buy new equipment.
